If not found: returns BOOL: TRUE or FALSE, and position in REF INT pos.

Format: instr(string, any char«,startpos») (char, can contain more them one char, in which case the position of the first appearance of any of them is returned.)

Languages: C, C++ (char * only, returns pointer to character)

Format: position = SCAN (string, set «, back» «, kind») or position = VERIFY (string, set «, back» «, kind»)[a]
string indexOf: char ifAbsent: aBlock string indexOf: char string includes: char
If not found: evaluate aBlock which is a BlockClosure (or any object understanding value) returns 0 returns true or false
returns 1 + the last position in string
